channel.title: A new multi-media children property being developed for a mobile, global children generation.

item.title: #sleepytown1
item.description:
#sleepytown1

The SleepyTown Collection is a Brand New multi-media, multi-cultural children project about a bully-free magical world that's accessible by using a very special key, and animals pretty much run the enchanted, fun filled world. Â The SleepyTown key is "whatever a kid or baby animal" loves the most:Â ðŸ’¤ðŸ’­ðŸ’žðŸ”‘ðŸ”“ðŸŽ‰. Â Once inside flying is optional but humorously encouraged. Â You can sing underwater with the help of a very special bubble gum. Â The main library chooses the reader and keeping the magical balance are the three powerful, shape-shifting, time bending Wyrdd Sisters. Â
